description: Information about courses and training programs

faqs.question: What courses does Indeed Inspiring Infotech offer?
responses: We offer courses in Data Science, Machine Learning, Business Analytics, and other IT-related domains.
Our training catalog includes AI, cloud computing, and full-stack development courses.

faqs.question: Are the training programs certified?
responses: Yes, the training programs come with certifications that are recognized by the industry.
We provide industry-accredited certifications upon successful course completion.

faqs.question: Does Indeed Inspiring Infotech provide hands-on training?
responses: Yes, the training programs include live projects and hands-on experience.
We focus on practical learning with real-world case studies and industry projects.

faqs.question: What is the duration of the training programs?
responses: The duration varies depending on the course, ranging from a few weeks to several months.
We offer flexible timelines to accommodate different learning needs.
